languages.text: {n}Оставшиеся при покойном {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} говорят о высоком положении — дорогие технологии обычно извлекают у мертвецов, и только самые статусные и богатые мертвецы избегают этой участи.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оставшиеся при покойном {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} говорят о высоком положении — дорогие технологии обычно извлекают у мертвецов, и только самые статусные и богатые мертвецы избегают этой участи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The implants left in the deceased body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy people get to avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

{n}The implants left in the deceased body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy people get to avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

{n}The implants left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

{n}The implants left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

languages.text: {n}死者身上依然保留着{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，这说明了这个人的显赫地位。这种技术产品价格昂贵，死后通常都会从死者身上摘下来。只有最煊赫、最富有的那些人，死后才能避免这样的命运。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死者身上依然保留着{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，这说明了这个人的显赫地位。这种技术产品价格昂贵，死后通常都会从死者身上摘下来。只有最煊赫、最富有的那些人，死后才能避免这样的命运。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} del cuerpo del difunto son muestra de su elevado estatus: normalmente, la tecnología cara se extrae de los fallecidos, y solo las personas más ricas y respetadas evitan ese destino al morir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} del cuerpo del difunto son muestra de su elevado estatus: normalmente, la tecnología cara se extrae de los fallecidos, y solo las personas más ricas y respetadas evitan ese destino al morir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遺体に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、高位の者が身につけるものだ。高価な技術は死者から取り外されるのが一般的な流れだが、著名人や富裕層だけがこの運命を免れることができる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遺体に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、高位の者が身につけるものだ。高価な技術は死者から取り外されるのが一般的な流れだが、著名人や富裕層だけがこの運命を免れることができる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} im Körper des Verstorbenen künden von seinem hohen Status – normalerweise wird teure Tech aus Leichen entfernt, und nur die wirklich Berühmten und Reichen entgehen nach ihrem Tod diesem Schicksal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} im Körper des Verstorbenen künden von seinem hohen Status – normalerweise wird teure Tech aus Leichen entfernt, und nur die wirklich Berühmten und Reichen entgehen nach ihrem Tod diesem Schicksal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le simple fait que les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} n'aient pas été retirés du corps témoigne du statut élevé du défunt : les technologies onéreuses sont généralement extraites des cadavres, et seuls les membres les plus éminents de la société peuvent espérer éviter ce triste sort à leur dépouille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le simple fait que les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} n'aient pas été retirés du corps témoigne du statut élevé du défunt : les technologies onéreuses sont généralement extraites des cadavres, et seuls les membres les plus éminents de la société peuvent espérer éviter ce triste sort à leur dépouille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Merhumun naaşındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g}, yüksek mevkisini belli ediyor. Pahalı teknik aksam genelde ölülerin bedeninden çıkarılır. Yalnızca en seçkin ve varlıklılar öldüklerinde bu kaderden sıyrılırlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} left in the deceased's body speak of his high standing — expensive tech is typically extracted from the dead, and only the most prominent and wealthy avoid this fate upon their death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhumun bedenindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g}, yüksek mevkisini belli ediyor. Pahalı tekno implantlar genelde ölülerin bedeninden çıkarılır. Yalnızca en seçkin ve varlıklı kişiler öldüklerinde bu kaderin mahkûmu olmazlar.{/n}
